title: Seeing Through
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Aaah! That was so much fun! I’m sorry that you ended up spending the whole day with me, Eli-san, but thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s fine. Was it refreshing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Refreshing....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>The rest of Aqours consulted me. They said you’re not the type to whine about things, so they wanted to give you some refreshing time. You sure have good friends<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh.... Eeeeh!? How!? How could they....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You see, the more things you try to hide from your friends, the more they will see through you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Uuu.... This is really embarrassing.... How should I even face them tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Just greet them like you usually do. They’re going to understand however you decide to act<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>*sigh*.... Is that how it works....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s how it works. So, since I made your face look gloomy again, I’ll have to make doubly sure that you get refreshed. There’s one more place that I want to take you to. Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
